title: Mint asset
detail: Please enter the information of the new token to be issued. All tokens are recorded on CodeChain and anyone has access to the information below.

description.title: Description (Optional)
description.tooltip: Please give a description for the token.

address.title: Mint asset in this address
address.tooltip: Tokens are issued to the address below and can be transferred to other addresses at any time.

fee.title: FEE
fee.tooltip: The minimum fee is 100,000 CCC, and the higher the fee, the faster it is processed.

url.label: Icon URL (Optional)
url.tooltip: Upload the url of the image to be used as the token's icon. If nothing is uploaded, a random icon(identicon) will be created.

supply.label: Supply
supply.tooltip: The total number of tokens issued.

payer.title: CHARGE FEE TO
payer.tooltip: The fee will be transferred from the address below.
